update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL of the HTTP endpoint.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout in seconds for the HTTP request.

not_follow_redirects.title: Not follow redirects
not_follow_redirects.description: If set, the client will not follow HTTP redirects automatically.

method.title: Method
method.description: The [HTTP method](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Methods) to use for the request. An empty string means `GET`.

body.title: Body
body.description: The body content to send along with the HTTP request (if applicable).

vnode.title: Vnode
vnode.description: Associates this data collection job with a [Virtual Node](https://learn.netdata.cloud/docs/netdata-agent/configuration/organize-systems-metrics-and-alerts#virtual-nodes).

status_accepted.title: Status code check
status_accepted.description: Specifies the list of **HTTP response status codes** that are considered **acceptable**. Responses with status codes not included in this list will be categorized as 'bad status' in the status chart.

response_match.title: Content check
response_match.description: Specifies a [regular expression](https://regex101.com/) pattern to match against the content (body) of the HTTP response. This check is performed only if the response's status code is accepted.

header_match.title: Header check
header_match.description: Specifies a set of rules to check for specific key-value pairs in the HTTP headers of the response.

exclude.title: Exclude
exclude.description: Determines whether the rule checks for the presence or absence of the specified key-value pair in the HTTP headers.

key.title: Header key
key.description: Specifies the exact name of the HTTP header to check for.

value.title: Header value pattern
value.description: Specifies the [matcher pattern](https://github.com/netdata/netdata/tree/master/src/go/plugin/go.d/pkg/matcher#readme) to match against the value of the specified header.

cookie_file.title: Cookie file
cookie_file.description: Specifies the path to the file containing cookies. For more information about the cookie file format, see [cookie file format](https://everything.curl.dev/http/cookies/fileformat).

bearer_token_file.title: Bearer Token File
bearer_token_file.description: Path to a file containing a bearer token for HTTP authentication.

force_http2.title: Force HTTP2
force_http2.description: If set, forces the use of HTTP/2 protocol for all requests, even over plain TCP (h2c).

proxy_url.title: Proxy URL
proxy_url.description: The URL of the proxy server.

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: Additional HTTP headers to include in the request.

tls_skip_verify.title: Skip TLS verification
tls_skip_verify.description: If set, TLS certificate verification will be skipped.

tls_ca.title: TLS CA
tls_ca.description: The path to the CA certificate file for TLS verification.

tls_cert.title: TLS certificate
tls_cert.description: The path to the client certificate file for TLS authentication.

tls_key.title: TLS key
tls_key.description: The path to the client key file for TLS authentication.

bearer_token_file.ui:help: The token is sent in the Authorization header as `Bearer <token>`. **Takes priority over basic authentication**.

vnode.ui:placeholder: To use this option, first create a Virtual Node and then reference its name here.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
